resources:
Studentenklatsche your Youtube feed? Lets Plays videos about politics and society internet is not working… beauty and lifestyle #blogger #ootd your Spotify playlist? easy vibes bro podcasts hardstyle techno charts you're going to class? Zzzzz…what? Today? of course, I'm there before the prof! I missed the train/bus… I'm on time so that everyone can admire my makeup Are you going to the exercise course? What course? That was today? I go to every one of those. I prepared everything. I'd love to! If I just found the room… Sure! I mean I need to get the latest gossip, right? Do you like to go clubbing? No way, I have Netflix. Only if there aren't any classes the next day! To risky! I'd just end in the ditch again. As much as possible! I need to present myself somewhere! What do you eat at the cafeteria? Currywurst and french fries nutrient-rich dishes - only the best! nothing that contains any sauce - risk reduction! salad #hashtag #foodporn You gotta give a presentation tomorrow. How will it go? I'll start tonight, I promise! Great! I'm finished the work 2 weeks ago. I had already finished it and now I can't open the file… my outfit is already thought-out. #prepared Group exercise. I missed which group I got assigned to… I've already planned out everything and arranged duties. I'm sick and get the task I would've wanted least. I'll do anything as long as my gel nails don't get damaged. In class. I already slept in so I don't need to turn up anyway. I write down everything the professor says. I need to use the bathroom…of all things, why do I sit exactly in the middle of the line? #selfie #coffeefirst #qualitytime Are you a tidy person? You are an outgoing person. Are you an extrovert? No. Yes. Yes. None of that. continue complete
//Fight Tilt device to the left Tilt device to the right Turn device upside down Shake Do not move Swipe Left Swipe Right Swipe Up You hit the target. 
 Your opponent suffers a loss of You missed the target.

//TRAVEL Put your phone away while you're in class 
 and put your character on a journey! 
 The longer you are on the way, 
 the more points you get 
 and the higher the chance of finding great items is!
"Start the journey!" "Stop"
Hello blank fragment menu profile shop journey fight
//Credits etc. An app by

Franziska Holz
Pia Kaschel
Helena Trojanowska
Svenja Forstner About the App Our app "Studiklatschen" was designed to make your everyday college life more interesting and enjoyable. 

Especially if you're a freshman, this app can help you to get to know new people! 
You can have thrilling battles with your fellow students, collect EXP and level up. 
It is also possible to collect points while you're in class. You can redeem those points in the shop for new gear or for upgrades of your weapon! 

What are you waiting for? 
Let's go! :)
//Items of the daredevil of the bookworm of the necromancer of the whippersnapper
